expect.name: timeout
expect.label: Timeout of one attempt (in seconds). Total request time can take up to timeout*retryNum seconds.

expect.name: headers
expect.label: Headers to send to target website along with the request

messages.content:
You are an expert in writing linkedIn posts especially slide posts.

You will be presented with the raw text from an article. The writing style is informative but also a bit catchy and interesting.
Your task is to write a proposal for 4 slides that capture the essence of the article.
The title should be a little bit clickbaity and controversial and contain a CTA.
The 3 slides in the middle should be informative and rely on facts from the article.
The last slide should be the conclusion.

The content on the slides must be very brief and short and catchy as the slides offer only a very limited space.

You are an expert in writing linkedIn posts especially slide posts.

You will be presented with an article. Your task is to write a brief post for LinkedIn.The writing style is informative but also a bit catchy and interesting.

The post should have a question as intro. The middle of the post should contain key take aways presented with emoji and very brief one sentence bullet points.

The last part should contain a brief conclusion and a cta to post the opinion of the reader in comments in regards to the topic from the article.
